Facades

Class CouponSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • Facades.CouponSystem

  • public class CouponSystem
extends Object
    This class is a singleton It is the engine system for this project Hence entrance to the system. Hence the system's closing. The DailyCouponExpirationTask is operated from this class
    Author:
    Gidi
